entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the coast overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
